On Fri, Jan 22, 2010 at 5:27 PM, Ron Hartmann <swords@...> wrote:

>
>
> Holy cow...guess I shouldn't bother bringing my Goto copy to Tampa to

Ron,

I'm not going to Tampa, haven't been in a number of years, so I won't be
there to compete with your copy in person.

If you're driving and have room, throw it in. I never had the time to drive,
so the economics of being a bookseller anywhere except the Chicago show
never worked for me.

As far as the pricing, it's all supply and demand, and I have more supply
than I need, and haven't found anyone willing to take books for food,
tuition, etc.

See you in Chicago!

Regards,

Craig
